definition[0]: to remove something from the earth using a spade
example[0]: I’ll dig up that plant and move it.
definition[1]: to remove the surface of an area of ground, road etc, or to make holes in it
example[1]: They’re digging up the road just outside my flat.
definition[2]: to find hidden or forgotten information by careful searching
example[2]: They tried to dig up something from his past to spoil his chances of being elected.
